programmes.show_name: Devil In Disguise: John Wayne Gacy
programmes.show_description: A psychiatrist uncovers Gacy's dark history as Tovar and Kozenczak examine how systems failed to stop his murders, and a romance develops between Billy Kindred and Mary Jane.
